ogalala.gloss: a member of the Siouan people who constituted a division of the Teton Sioux and who formerly inhabited the Black Hills of western South Dakota

ogden.gloss: English psychologist who collaborated with I. A. Richards in designing Basic English (1889-1957)

ogden nash.gloss: United States writer noted for his droll epigrams (1902-1971)

ogdoad.gloss: the cardinal number that is the sum of seven and one

ogee.gloss: a molding that (in section) has the shape of an S with the convex part above and the concave part below

ogee arch.gloss: a pointed arch having an S-shape on both sides

ogive.gloss: front consisting of the conical head of a missile or rocket that protects the payload from heat during its passage through the atmosphere

oglala.gloss: a member of the Siouan people who constituted a division of the Teton Sioux and who formerly inhabited the Black Hills of western South Dakota

ogre.gloss: a cruel wicked and inhuman person
